song_name: Love on the Rocks with No Ice
lyrics:
4 contributorslove on the rocks with no ice lyricsverse 1
you cant abide my showing fatigue
when you come home just to relay
all the events that made your heart bleed
and the ones that ruined your day

as everybody thinks
in the eye of the storm
oh we keep each other warm
